name: Perpixeled
description:
Perpixeled is a logic game that generates random "nonogram" style puzzles. The player must use logic to figure out which squares on a grid are filled in. Currently in beta, feedback welcome.

Features:

  • hints
  • error correction
  • limitless puzzles
  • interactive tutorial
  • helpful sounds
  • adjustable puzzle settings
  • colourblind friendly

Known issues:

  • not suitable for audio only players
  • no keyboard navigation
  • extra tile on the left, visible on wide screens
  • some puzzles can only be solved by guessing
